name: Insect Busters
description:
In this game, you will be fighting insectoids. You have 3 different weapons to do it. Test yourself!

Modifications:

  • Invulnerability pickup (you will be invulnerable to any kind of damage for some time)
  • Acid (deals damage when you fall inside)
  • Special Camera (appears when you fall into the acid)
  • Teleports (inside the location (not between levels))
  • Changed behavior of enemies (they will be searching for you in some area if you disappear)
  • 5 different levels
  • 2 boss fights (last boss fight is special)
